pageContext.claim: “A lot of elections -- elections are being lost -- because of sanctuary cities, because people don't want it. We just won two in the great state of North Carolina -- two House seats. And they were won by big margins, and I helped. I was very happy about that. The only problem is they don't want to write about it.”
pageContext.analysis: Both seats were already held by Republicans, only one race was considered close, and the GOP candidate was ahead in every poll.
